Projects

Algorithms for Precision Medicine

Spatial Transcriptomics with Transformers

Aim to profile gene expression patterns in the spatial context of tissue microenvironment. Our transformer-based model (Vaswani et. al., (2017)) for spatial transcriptomics analyze the integrated single cell genomics and its spatial information, with the goal of achieving a better understanding of tissues emergent proprieties and pathology.

Patient Stratification

Aim to correctly identify patient's pathology based on availiable data such as clinical, genomic, metabolomic, and disease mutation data. Our patient similarity network model identifies predictive features from the integrated data and classify unknown patient based on similiarity.

Let's build something together
